channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- PowerEdge Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- PowerEdge Platform

item.title: CVE-2022-34422|2024-08-03T09:07:16.314Z -- dell -- poweredge%20platform
item.description: Dell PowerEdge BIOS and Dell Precision BIOS contain an Improper SMM communication buffer verification vulnerability. A local malicious user with high Privileges may potentially exploit this vulnerability to perform arbitrary code execution or cause denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2022-34412|2024-08-03T09:07:16.315Z -- dell -- poweredge%20platform
item.description: Dell PowerEdge BIOS and Dell Precision BIOS contain an Improper SMM communication buffer verification vulnerability. A local malicious user with high Privileges may potentially exploit this vulnerability to perform arbitrary code execution or cause denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2022-34376|2024-08-03T09:07:16.140Z -- dell -- poweredge%20platform
item.description: Dell PowerEdge BIOS and Dell Precision BIOS contain an improper input validation vulnerability. A local authenticated malicious user may potentially exploit this vulnerability by manipulating an SMI to cause a denial of service during SMM.

item.title: CVE-2022-34419|2024-08-03T09:07:16.158Z -- dell -- poweredge%20platform

item.title: CVE-2022-22558|2024-08-03T03:14:55.684Z -- dell -- poweredge%20platform
item.description: Dell PowerEdge Server BIOS and Dell Precision Workstation 7910 and 7920 Rack BIOS contain an Improper SMM communication buffer verification vulnerability. A Local High Privileged attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability leading to arbitrary writes or denial of service.

item.description: Dell PowerEdge BIOS and Dell Precision BIOS contain an Improper SMM communication buffer verification vulnerability. A local malicious user with high Privileges may potentially exploit this vulnerability to perform arbitrary code execution or cause denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-0172|2024-08-01T17:41:16.006Z -- dell -- poweredge%20platform
item.description: Dell PowerEdge Server BIOS and Dell Precision Rack BIOS contain an improper privilege management security vulnerability. An unauthenticated local attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2024-0173|2024-08-01T17:41:16.066Z -- dell -- poweredge%20platform
item.description: Dell PowerEdge Server BIOS and Dell Precision Rack BIOS contain an improper parameter initialization vulnerability. A local low privileged attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability to read the contents of non-SMM stack memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-0154|2024-08-01T17:41:16.006Z -- dell -- poweredge%20platform
item.description: Dell PowerEdge Server BIOS and Dell Precision Rack BIOS contain an improper parameter initialization vulnerability. A local low privileged attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability to read the contents of non-SMM stack memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-0171|2024-08-01T17:41:15.984Z -- dell -- poweredge%20platform
item.description: Dell PowerEdge Server BIOS contains an TOCTOU race condition vulnerability. A local low privileged attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability to gain access to otherwise unauthorized resources.

item.title: CVE-2024-0161|2024-08-01T17:41:15.986Z -- dell -- poweredge%20platform
item.description: Dell PowerEdge Server BIOS and Dell Precision Rack BIOS contain an Improper SMM communication buffer verification vulnerability. A local low privileged attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability leading to arbitrary writes to SMRAM.

item.title: CVE-2024-0171|2024-06-25T15:30:42.589Z -- dell -- poweredge%20platform
item.description: Dell PowerEdge Server BIOS contains an TOCTOU race condition vulnerability. A local low privileged attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability to gain access to otherwise unauthorized resources.

item.title: CVE-2024-25942|2024-03-19T07:52:29.228Z -- dell -- poweredge%20platform
item.description: Dell PowerEdge Server BIOS contains an Improper SMM communication buffer verification vulnerability. A physical high privileged attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability leading to arbitrary writes to SMRAM.

item.title: CVE-2024-22453|2024-06-04T17:52:52.907Z -- dell -- poweredge%20platform
item.description: Dell PowerEdge Server BIOS contains a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability. A local high privileged attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability to write to otherwise unauthorized memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-0173|2024-06-04T17:58:23.919Z -- dell -- poweredge%20platform
item.description: Dell PowerEdge Server BIOS and Dell Precision Rack BIOS contain an improper parameter initialization vulnerability. A local low privileged attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability to read the contents of non-SMM stack memory.

item.description: Dell PowerEdge Server BIOS and Dell Precision Rack BIOS contain an improper privilege management security vulnerability. An unauthenticated local attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to privilege escalation.
